article:
Events and trends
* 639 BC - Interregnum ends and Ancus Marcius becomes the king of Rome.
* 636 BC â Duke Wen of Jin ascends to power in the State of Jin during the Zhou
  Dynasty of China.
* 632 BC â Cylon, Athenian noble, seizes the Acropolis in a failed attempt to
  become king.
* 632 BC â In the Battle of Chengpu, the Chinese kingdom of Jin and her allies
  defeat the kingdom of Chu and her allies.
* 631 BC â Founding of Cyrene, a Greek colony in Libya (North Africa)
  (approximate date).
* 631 BC â Sadyattes becomes king of Lydia.
